elements.title: Toshiko Ueda (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Toshiko Ueda (pictured), the author of the manga series Fuichin-san, was still actively publishing new manga at the age of 90?

elements.title: a Kentucky TV station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in 1969, unknown persons dynamited the tower of a Kentucky TV station, leaving it leaning at a 15-degree angle?

elements.title: Stanley Stair (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that at 107 years old, Stanley Stair of Jamaica was at the time of his death the last surviving Caribbean veteran of World War I?

elements.title: Funk Wav Bounces Vol. 2 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Calvin Harris's 2022 album Funk Wav Bounces Vol. 2 features nearly 20 collaborators, including Justin Timberlake, Snoop Dogg, and Busta Rhymes?

elements.title: Daisy Belmore (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that actress Daisy Belmore disfigured her appearance for a character in a play so significantly that she was barely recognised in the street by audience members?

elements.title: From Where They Stood (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the 2021 French documentary From Where They Stood examines photographs secretly taken by inmates of Nazi concentration camps?

elements.title: Jerold F. Lucey (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Jerold F. Lucey introduced phototherapy to the United States as a treatment for jaundice in newborns?

elements.title: roundabout chairs (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that seats of some roundabout chairs have corners?
